price: 60. Nanu sin fanal raba mekelleeh, nanu yaffare mara hinnino,
arabic: نَحۡنُ قَدَّرۡنَا بَيۡنَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu qaddarnā baynakumu al-mawta wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
